lead_paragraph: LEVINE--Joy M.,on July 5, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Izzy. Loving mother of David Levine, Carol and Jeffrey Goldberg. Cherished grandmother of Samantha, Justin and Susie. Devoted great-grandmother of Julian, Emily, Sophie, and Ivy. Adored sister of Gerald and Delores Michael and Helen Levine. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LEVINE, JOY M.
